[6.8](10-10-2021)
- Now all internet info loads at runtime
- Moved internet info tools to our `master` class, as `master.net`

[6.7](10-10-2021)
- Updated `info` command
- Runtime script code enhancement
- Reduced Script loading time
- Fixed player's entry execution time 

[6.6](07-10-2021)
- Updated updating script
- Fixes in 'skin' command 

[6.5](03-10-2021)
- Internal code cleanup
- Added a toggle to remove tickets fucntionality
- Added init script to load all the things at runtime

[6.4](29-09-2021)
- Added support for resursive mode for updating json files using builtin update method
- Made lockdownmode more natural 
- FIxed entry log

[6.3](28-09-2021)
- Added support for direct account_id in `add`, `remove` and `ban` commands
- If lockdownmode enbled, server will auto become at 0 players position
- Added loggers for players entry and kicks 

[6.2](27-09-2021)
- Some fixes in lock_down mode

[6.0](27-09-2021)
- Released Private Server Build with Beta Tag
- Fixed 2 typos in commands
- Added support for party queue Entries (See README for better details)
- Added toggles to enable and disable flymode
- Added togles for afk kicker service and time period
- Added extra toggles in map text
- Internal code cleanup

[5.7](23-09-2021)
- Handled all internal mods exceptions
- Some more fixes in lobby spamming and filters
- Fixed `resetcodes` command
- Finally fixed internal requests handling
- Internal traceback logger, it helps me to make script bugs free
- Added support for multiple backup files with multiple time periods
- I am not remebering now !


[5.6](22-09-2021)
- Added a command `universal`
- Added powerfull whitelisting service
- Added lobby afk service with time customisations
- Added bot spam measure at internal root (to gain real speed)
- Written configs information at /ba_root/mods/world/CONFIGS_INFO.md
- Added universal ban feature (Like once you spam with a bot then you will be targeted as universal ban)

[5.5](19-09-2021)
- Config class Optimised
- Added Powerups (Thanks to Bombdash)
- Fixed a stupid impotation mistake
- Introduced Plugin system for powerups

[5.4](17-09-2021)
- Improved startup
- Fixed a typo in README

[5.3](16-09-2021)
- Fixed a stupid typo
- Migrated to `neon` library for internal c++ for better requests

[5.2](16-09-2021)
- Updated LirikApi
- Added separate method to generate tokens for LirikAPi, check methods file

[5.1](15-09-2021)
- Added self updating feature for updating script
- This version needs to be clean installed

[5.0](15-09-2021)
- Restructured updating environment
- This version needs to be clean installed

[4.6](14-09-2021)
- Fixed commands
- Changed storage objects to shiny classes

[4.5](13-09-2021)
- Optimised code
- Imported all methods to a file called methods.py
- Written docs for all methods

[1.0](30-06-2021)
- Initial release
